register.reg_condition: when FEAT_ITE is implemented and FEAT_TRC_SR is implemented

purpose_text.para: Provides EL1 controls for Trace Instrumentation.

field_value_description.para: Instrumentation trace not prohibited at EL1.

field_description.para: This field is ignored by the PE when EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state and HCR_EL2.TGE == 1.

field_value_description.para: Instrumentation trace not prohibited at EL0.
